name: HaikuPoem
0:
”Alexa open Haiku Poem”
”Alexa launch Haiku Poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku poem
des:
Haiku Poem recites a randomly selected haiku poem to your Alexa device! Brighten your day with a classical haiku poem.
To hear a haiku poem, just say "Alexa, tell “Haiku Poem to read me a poem." or “Alexa, tell Haiku Poem to recite a poem.”
